▿ Step
  ResponseEnded

▿ Request
  GET http://localhost:8080/account
  Cookie: pf_session={"flash":{"message":"You’ve subscribed!","priority":"notice"},"userId":"00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000"}

  (Data, 0 bytes)

▿ Response
  Status 200 OK
  Content-Length: 35680
  Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8
  Set-Cookie: pf_session={"userId":"00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000"}; Path=/

subscribed!</p>
  </div></div></div><div class="bg-blue900 m-pt2 m-pb2 m-pl2 m-pr2 d-pt4 d-pb4 middle-m between-m row"><div class=" col-m"><div class="hide-d"><a href="/"><img alt="" src="data:image/svg+xml;base64, " d-pt4 d-pb4"><div class="m-pb2 row"><div class=" col-m col-m-12"><div><h1 class="fg-black bold h2 lh-2">Account</h1></div></div></div><div class="m-pb4 row"><div class=" col-m col-m-12"><div><h2 class="fg-black bold h4 lh-2">Profile</h2><form action="/account" method="POST"><label class="h5 bold block m-mb1">Name</label><input class="font-family-inherit fg-black border-box rounded border border-gray-800 h-3r m-pl1 m-pr1 m-pt1 m-pb1 m-mb2 w-100p block" name="name" type="text" value="Blob"><label class="h5 bold block m-mb1">Email</label><input class="font-family-inherit fg-black border-box rounded border border-gray-800 h-3r m-pl1 m-pr1 m-pt1 m-pb1 m-mb2 w-100p block" name="email" type="email" value="hello@pointfree.co"><p>Receive email when:</p><p class="m-pl1"><label class="block"><input type="checkbox" name="emailSettings[announcements]" class="m-mr1">New announcements (very infrequently)</label><label class="block"><input type="checkbox" name="emailSettings[newEpisode]" checked class="m-mr1">New episode is available (about once a week)</label></p><input type="submit" class="medium cursor-pointer nowrap btn-normal rounded border-none text-decoration-none pf-link-white fg-white bg-purple h5 m-pl2 m-pr2 m-mt3" value="Update profile"></form></div></div></div><div class="m-pb4 row"><div class=" col-m col-m-12"><div><h2 class="fg-black bold h4 lh-2">Subscription overview</h2><div class=" col-m col-m-12"><div class="m-pt1 m-pb3"><div class=" row"><div class=" col-m col-m-3"><p><div>Plan</div></p></div><div class=" col-m col-m-9"><div cursor-pointer nowrap btn-normal rounded border-none text-decoration-none pf-link-white fg-white bg-purple h6 m-pt1 m-pb1 m-pl1 m-pr1" href="/account/subscription/upgrade">Upgrade</a></p></div></div></div></div></div><div class=" row"><div class=" col-m col-m-3"><p><div>Status</div></p></div><div class=" col-m col-m-9"><div class=" row"><div class=" col-m col-m-12 col-d-6"><div class="m-pl1 m-pr1"><p>Active</p></div></div><div class=" col-m col-m-12 col-d-6"><div class="m-pl1 m-pr1 end-d"><p><a class="medium cursor-pointer row"><div class=" col-m col-m-3"><p><div>Next billing</div></p></div><div class=" col-m col-m-9"><div class="m-pl1 m-pr1"><p>$17.00 on 3/2/18</p></div></div></div></div><div class="border-top
